%s-words_already_have_audio Upload To Commons Wiki Explore Spell for Wiktionary Spell for Word Spell for WordList
Welcome Wiktionary Explore Spell For Word Permission Request Spell For Word List Spell4Wiki app to record and upload audios for Wiki commons.\nAlso act as wiki dictionary. You can search and view words meaning form wikitionary for any languages. You can record and upload audios for your own word list from your device. You can record and upload audio for your custom word. Spell4Wiki requires storage and record audio permissions.\nAllow those permissions Search on Wiktionary Donate How? Record Forgot your password? Join Wikipedia OR Skip Login Please wait Selected Language : %s @string/app_intro_slide_1_description Version : 1.0 & License : GPLv3 Rate Us Share Rate App Powered By Kaniyam தமிழ் மொழி மற்றும் இனக்குழுக்கள் சார்ந்த மெய்நிகர்வளங்கள், கருவிகள் மற்றும் அறிவுத்தொகுதிகள், அனைவருக்கும் கட்டற்ற அணுக்கத்தில் கிடைக்கும் சூழல் http://www.kaniyam.com/ VGLUG Villupuram GNU/Linux Users Group (Villupuram GLUG) is a non profit organization started in 2013, Impression of Free and open-source software (FOSS). https://vglug.org/ See Source Code Help Development Contact Us Third Party Libraries Source Code How To Contribute?
